<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 3: Apply Kingdom XP](/Rules.aspx?ID=1812)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 539</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The GM now awards any kingdom XP earned during that turn. If the kingdom experienced a random event, it receives 30 XP. The first Kingdom turn that your kingdom spent 100 RP, gain 80 kingdom XP as a [milestone award](/Rules.aspx?ID=1816).

 In addition, any RP that remains unspent is now converted to kingdom XP on a 1 to 1 ration, to a maximum of 120 XP per Kingdom turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
